name: Pepper Steak and Rice
author: HELENWRG
summary: This is a recipe that all my children loved, and that my daughters still make.
ingredients: 1  medium onion, sliced and separated into rings
1 pound boneless sirloin steak, cut into thin strips
directions: Place rice and 2 cups water in a medium saucepan, and bring to a boil
Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 20 minutes
Heat olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat, and saute onion and green bell pepper until tender
Stir steak, garlic, and browning sauce into the onion and green bell pepper mixture
Season with paprika, seasoning salt, and black pepper
Cook and stir until steak is evenly browned
Mix in 1 1/2 cups water, and bring to a boil
In a small bowl, dissolve cornstarch in 1/2 cup water
Stir into the boiling steak mixture until thickened
